settings.custom_liquid:
Clinically proven Recovery & Repair Gel-Refill

Inflammatory conditions, Rosacea, Acne

(Based on 102 reviews)

A lightweight, nourishing, natural gel that alters the way your skin behaves. Everyone deserves to love their skin. Prescription medications target one problem, while creating another. We target your skin problems, without creating more. Welcome to the world of effective skincare with no side-effects. Clinically-proven to target acne and rosacea all while working as a super-hydrator to give you a five-star glow. We use an innovative cold-pressing technique to extract the bio-active compound in red-algae which is the superfood for your skin. The active compound in red-algae boasts an internal healing process, encouraging your cell to produce healthy cells and healthy skin all by itself. Sound too good to be true? Read on.

settings.heading: Clinically Proven Results
settings.content: +97% Success rate in all Clinical Trials within 28 days using Recovery & Repair Gel

settings.heading: ingredients
settings.content: Water, Chamomile flower extract, Calendula flower extract, Red Algae Gel, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerine, Jojoba seed oil, Glycerol, Salicylic acid

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
For the face: Gently massage a small amount of the gel to cleansed skin, until fully absorbed. Use as part of your daily skin care routine. For best results, use twice daily.

For the body: Gently massage a small amount of the gel to the area of concern, until fully absorbed. For best results, use twice daily.

Recommendations: For dry, irritated red skin, use the gel between 1 to 3 times a day. For sensitivity to sunlight, please apply sun protection or any other topical cream prior to application of the gel (Dermatological recommendation)

We recommend to trial the gel on a small area of skin at least 24 hours prior to initial use.

Cautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If this should occur, rinse thoroughly with clean water. Keep out of reach of children.

*Suitable for any skin type and safe for pregnant women

settings.heading: 28 days
settings.description:
Your skin will retain moisture & increase hydration by an average of 17%-resulting in a shinier, smoother and even skin tone.

Redness and inflammation will have decreased by an average of 20%.

Bumps, blemishes and acne will have diminished in size.

Astaxanthin, the bioactive compound in red algae is a strong antioxidant, this in combination with your SPF will protect your skin from premature ageing and the onset of fine lines and wrinkles.

settings.heading: 56 Days
settings.description:
Your skin will be less prone to breakouts because of the powerful Astaxanthin, the bio-active compound in red algae, which can limit external stressorssuch as reactive oxidative species, the skin’s reaction to temperature, pollution and humidity.

By now, you will see a significant reduction in redness & inflammation.

Previous bumps, blemishes and acne will be less visible, you will have less new breakouts and previous scarring will become less visible.

The skin regained its healthy colorand will feel soft, supple and smooth

settings.heading: 84 Days
settings.description:
Acne, blemishes & bumps will disappear.

The skin is plump, glowing & smooth.

The skin is clear and congestion free.

The skin's barrier is strong and resilient.

Dark spots & hyperpigmentation will begin to fade.

Wrinkles and fine lines will be reduced.
